---
title: "CoastWatch Office Hours"
description: "Every other Thursday, 11 am PST" 
---


Hosted by the West Coast Node and PolarWatch 

[every other Thursday at 11 am PST](https://meet.google.com/zgm-nsan-pwk)

Upcoming dates: March 5, 12  

Everyone is welcome to come to the CoastWatch Office Hour where people can:

* Ask questions about satellite data
* Request help with accessing satellite data products
* Get troubleshooting assistance with code examples for discovering, accessing and working with satellite data 
  * [CoastWatch Lectures](https://umd.instructure.com/courses/1336575/pages/all-lectures) 
  * [CoastWatch Tutorials](https://github.com/coastwatch-training/CoastWatch-Tutorials/blob/main/README.md)
